title: Camera Image Sensor Digital Design Engineer
summary: Are you a leader and want to apply your engineering background to make big things happen, and can you influence, connect, get results and communicate effectively while delivering on a predictable and dynamic schedule? The Custom Silicon Management Group provides critical custom sensor silicon for all mobile products including iPhone, iPod, and AppleTV.
description: As a Sensor Digital Designer you will own the specification and verification of sensor digital signal processing and many aspects of sensor interfaces
preferred_qualifications: Experience with modern design verification techniques in mixed signal environments, Ability to use industry standard ASIC design tools including Lint, CDC, DFT tools, Hands on experience with bring-up of ASICs, Multi-disciplinary understanding of EE, CE, and Physics principles is a plus, Ability to work closely with others in a very multi-functional team environment
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $157,000 and $278,900, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
